caption.p: Distribution of anti fungal effect of different plant extract (E1: Nerium sp; E2: Mentha; E3: Aloe-vera; E4: Euclyptus) and their % inhibition (GC: growth control; A-50: Ciprofloxacin 50 Âµg/ml). Different alphabets in separate plants (E1-E4) showed significant variation. Significance was calculated by post hoc Tukey one way ANOVA at p < 0.05.
